editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by Hill Museum & Manuscript Library.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This XML file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msItem.title: Homily on John the Baptist by "the Orthodox"
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘርቱዐ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ዘደረሰ፡ በእንተ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ መጥምቅ፡

msItem.title: Anonymous homily for St. John's Day
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ በጸሎተ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ መጥምቅ፡
msItem.note: On f. 9r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በተከዜ.

msItem.title: Homily for the feast of the Holy Cross by the bishop Minās
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘሚናስ፡ ጳጳስ፡ ነገር፡ በእንተ፡ ክቡር፡ መስቀል፡
msItem.note: On f. 10r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በበዓለ፡ መስቀል፡.

msItem.title: Homily for the feast of the Holy Cross by James of Sarug
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘብፁዕ፡ ወቅዱስ፡ አባ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ዘስሩግ፡ በእንተ፡ መስቀል።
msItem.note: On f. 14r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በመስቀል፡.

msItem.title: The story of the appearance of the Holy Cross to emperor Constantine
msItem.incipit: አርአያ፡ መስቀል፡ ዘአስተርአዮ፡ ለቈስጠንጢኖስ፡ ወበዘ፡ ረከበት፡ እሌኒ፡ ዕፀ፡ መስቀል፡ በሳብዕ፡ ዓመተ፡ መንግሥቱ፡ ለቈስጠንጢኖስ፡ ንጉሥ።
msItem.note: On f. 15v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በእሌኒ፡.

msItem.title: The story of the finding of the Holy Cross, for the feast of St. Helena
msItem.incipit: ወኮነ፡ በመዋዕለ፡ ቈስጠንጢኖስ፡ ዐቢይ፡ ንጉሥ፡ ብእሲ፡ ፈራሄ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ወእሙኒ፡ ንግሥት፡ ፈራሂተ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ይእቲ፡ እሌኒ፡ ስማ።
msItem.note: On f. 23r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በእሌኒ፡.

msItem.title: Homily for the feast of the 70 Disciples and the 318 Orthodox Fathers of Nicea by Minās, bishop of Axum
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘብፁዕ፡ ወቅዱስ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ሚናስ፡ ዘአክሱም፡ በእንተ፡ ሰብዓ፡ አርድእት፡ ወበእንተ፡ ቅዱሳን፡ አበው፡ እለ፡ በኒቅያ፡ ተጋብኡ፡ ፫፻፡ ፲ወ፰፡ ጳጳሳት።
msItem.note: On f. 27r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በብዙኃን፡.

msItem.title: Homily for the feast of John the Evangelist by Cyril of Alexandria
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘቄርሎስ፡ ሊቀ፡ ጳጳሳት፡ ዘእልስክንድርያ፡ በበዓለ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ወንጌላዊ፡ ዘደረሰ፡ በይእቲ፡ ዕለት፡ በቅድመ፡ ኵሉ፡ ጉባኤ።
msItem.note: On f. 33v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading ዘደቂቀ፡ ዘብዴዎስ፡.

msItem.title: Anonymous homily for the commemoration of ʾƎlla ʾAṣbǝḥa on the 4th of Ṭǝqǝmt
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ በዕለተ፡ እለ፡ አጽብሓ፡ ዘቅዱሳን፡ ተዝካራተ፡ እለ፡ ይዌድሱ፡ ክብረ፡ ሎሙ፡ ይደልዎሙ፡ በኀበ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ዐስቦሙ፡ ይንሥኡ።
msItem.note: On f. 34v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading እም፡ ረቡዑ፡ ለጥቅምት፡ በተዝካረ፡ እለ፡ አጽብሓ፡.

msItem.title: Homily on the commemoration of ʾabbā Yoḥanni
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘብፁዕ፡ ወቅዱስ፡ ሚናስ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ዘአክሱም፡ ዘደረሰ፡ በእንተ፡ ብፁዕ፡ ወቅዱስ፡ አባ፡ ዮሐኒ።
msItem.note: On f. 35v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በአባ፡ ዮሐኒ፡.

msItem.title: Homily by "Orthodox" on the two Sabbaths
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ በእንተ፡ ሰንበታት፡ ዘደረሰ፡ ርቱዐ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ለመእመናን፡ ሕዝብ።
msItem.note: On f. 37v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡.

msItem.title: Encomium for the commemoration of the Four Living Creatures on the 8th of Ḫǝdār
msItem.incipit: ውዳሴ፡ ዘይቤ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ወክቡር፡ አባ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ በኵሉ፡ ግብሩ፡ ዘኮነ፡ ማኅደረ፡ ለመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ሊቀ፡ ጳጳሳት፡ ዘቈስጠንጢኖስ፡ ጶሊስ፡ ሀገር፡ በእንተ፡ ዕበዮሙ፡ ለ፬፡ እንስሳ፡
msItem.note: On f. 48v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በ፬፡ እንስሳ፡.

msItem.title: Homily for the commemoration of the Egyptian martyr Menas
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘቅዱስ፡ ወብፁዕ፡ ድራትዮስ፡ ሊቀ፡ ጳጳሳት፡ በእንተ፡ ብፁዕ፡ ሚናስ፡
msItem.note: On f. 57v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በሚናስ፡.

msItem.title: Anonymous homily for the commemoration of John the Baptist and the consecration of his church
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ዘዮሐንስ፡ መፍቀሪተ፡ ገዳም፡ እንተ፡ ውስተ፡ ገዳም፡ ተኀድር፡ ትጼውዕ፡
msItem.note: On f. 60r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading አመ፳፬፡ ለኅዳር፡ ወበቅዳሴ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡.

msItem.title: Anonymous homily for the commemoration of the Four Living Creatures and the Twenty-Four Elders of Heaven
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘይትነበብ፡ በካህናት፡ ወበ፬፡ እንስሳ፡
msItem.note: On f. 63v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በ፬፡ እንስሳ፡ ወበካህናተ፡ ሰማይ፡.

msItem.title: Homily for the commemoration of St. Michael on the 12th of Ḫǝdār, by Damātiyās, bishop of Alexandria
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ነገሩ፡ ዘቅዱስ፡ አባ፡ ድማቲያስ፡ ሊቀ፡ ጳጳሳት፡ ዘእልስክንድርያ፡ በበዓለ፡ ሊቀ፡ መላእክት፡ ሚካኤል፡ አመ፡ ፲ወ፪፡ ዕለቱ፡ ለኅዳር።
msItem.note: On f. 69r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading አመ፡ ፲ወ፪፡ ለኅዳር፡.

msItem.title: Anonymous homily for the commemoration of the Twenty-Four Elders of Heaven
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘ፳ወ፬፡ ካህናተ፡ ሰማይ፡ ዐቀብተ፡ ሥራይ፡ እሙንቱ፡ ካህናት፡ ለድውያን፡ ሕዝብ፡ ወፈውሳነ፡ ቍስሎሙ፡ ለእለ፡ የሐሙ፡ ወይትሀወኩ፡ በነገሮሙ፡ ለዕልዋነ፡ ሃይማኖት፡
msItem.note: On f. 73r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በካህናተ፡ ሰማይ፡.

msItem.title: Anonymous homily for the commemoration of St. Peter, Patriarch of Alexandria, and St. Mark
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘጴጥሮስ፡ ወማርቆስ፡ ወንጌላዊ፡ ነገረ፡ ስኒዶስ፡ ዘሕግ፡ ከመዝ።
msItem.note: On f. 79r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በጴጥሮስ፡ ወበማርቆስ፡.

msItem.title: Homily by ʾabbā Yāʿeqob on the Annunciation and on Sts. Mary and Elizabeth
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘአባ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ በስብከተ፡ ጌና፡ ዘበእንተ፡ ማርያም፡ ወኤልሳቤጥ፡
msItem.note: On f. 80v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading ዘስብከተ፡ ጌና፡.

msItem.title: Homily by ʾabbā Yāʿeqob on the Annunciation and on Sts. Mary and Elizabeth
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘአባ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ ዘብርሃን፡
msItem.note: On f. 82r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading ዘብርሃን፡.

msItem.title: Anonymous homily for the commemoration of Frumentius, for the 18th of Tāḫśāś, the day on which he died, according to this homily
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘቅዱስ፡ ወብፁዕ፡ ፍርማጦስ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ዘአልሱም፡
msItem.note: On f. 84v in the upper margin a note indicating the reading ዘአባ፡ ሰላማ፡.

msItem.title: Homily on the angels, the divinity and faith, for the commemoration of St. Gabriel on the 19th of Tāḫśāś
msItem.incipit: ድርሳን፡ ዘባስልዮስ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ርቱዐ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ በእንተ፡ መላእክት፡ ወመለኮት፡ ወበእንተ፡ ሃይማኖት።
msItem.note: On f. 86r in the upper margin a note indicating the reading በገብሬል፡.

supportDesc.condition: Ff 3a-6b and 279a-280a has been cut off. Part of the text on ff.57a and 155ab has been erased by the copyist. There may be several leaves missing after f.132, as the readings for the Fast now follow immediately the reading for the 8th of Yakkātit.

decoNote.desc: Decorations of different sizes are found on ff. 133a, 138b and 139b.

history.provenance: Colophon indicates that the ms was copied by Marqoreyos for Aqqābē Sa'āt Bakkimos, who donated it to the Monastery of Hayq Estifānos. In Monastery of Ḥayq Esṭifānos when filmed.

projectDesc.p: Encoded according to TEI P5 Guidelines.

revisionDesc.change: Created minimal record with link from data sent from Daniel Gullo, HMML project.
